Question:
Which team is acknowledged for their "systematic play" in April 1872? 
A) Shropshire Wanderers 
B) Nottingham Forest 
C) Blackburn Olympic 
D) Trent College

Who was the Barcelona coach that occasionally used Michael Laudrup as a False 9?     
A) Johan Cruyff     
B) Pep Guardiola     
C) Tito Vilanova     
D) Luis Enrique

Which of the following is an example of a region that FIFA recognizes for representation despite not being an independent country?    
A) Gibraltar    
B) Hawaii    
C) Catalonia    
D) Texas

Which of the following best describes the traditional basis for a player's eligibility to represent a national team?    
A) The player's club performance    
B) The player's legal nationality    
C) The player's age    
D) The player's position on the field

Why are "Ball boys or ball girls" important during a match?     
A) They provide moral support to the team     
B) They help speed up the game by retrieving balls     
C) They are potential future players     
D) They decide who gets possession after the ball goes out
